attributes.action: Increase State Pensions for People over 65
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Through these difficult times no-one has been more hit than the elderly, unlike younger folk they cannot get a job or a second job to make ends meet. They have the same bills as everybody else but certainly not the same income and they need good food as all of us to survive and especially in colder weather.
Those that have nothing more than the State Pension and have worked all their lives now have to count every penny and can not even afford a hoiliday,
I suggest all State Pension for anyone on only that and less than £20.000 savings and having proven to have worked for more than 30 years paying Tax and Nat Ins, should recieve no less than £250.00 per week to help survive and enjoy the last few years of their lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
